list.name: Changes
list.comment: - [x] Confirmation page < ADD < download invoices - [x] checkout guard - [x] order confirmation guard - [x] account login guard - [x] Slider > Link with hyperlink - [x] Categories you might like (Fix linkes) - [x] Menus and sub menus (Fix linkks) - [x] Change pagination > Load more - [x] Flash sales (in Home) + Add separated page for all flash sales (Like the main source [nomahd.com](http://nomahd.com/) including counter time) - [x] Link sellers to sellers profile (Add store profile page ) - [x] Shop seller (Register & Login page ) > Redirect Blade (Seller) ################# imporsonate logic need to be checked - [x] Coupons system (just check) - [x] OTP (choose your own) ############# when access dashboard for first time - [x] Images in whole website (Fix alignment) - [x] Redirect (after add to cart > close add > open cart) - [x] Quantity in card > need fix - [x] Fix sold out (in proudct details bottom sticky bar) - [x] Wish list (Language > need fix - [x] Footer ( Same like main source nomahd.com) - [x] Add size chart in Product details > instead of delivery *& return - [x] Delivery and return popup > link to backend
